Articles.Content:
Made in the same principle as Mk2 Expansion Pack (i.e. using stock textures wherever is possible to reduce RAM usage).

Three parts, to replicate such planes as A-380 and Boeing 747:

- Two-storey passenger fuselage (32 Kerbals)

- Two-storey cockpit

- Mk3 to two-storey adapter\passenger fuselage (would probably need some custom IVA showing stairs)

Parts to replicate large cargo planes like An-124 and C-5 Galaxy:

- Two-storey cargo bay

- Two-storey cockpit\loading ramp (like that on C-5 - i.e. the nose moves up)

- Two-storey rear loading ramp

Lack's [Stock Extension](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79542-90-SXT-Lack-s-Stock-Extension-SXT-19-07DEC14-KSC-v3) has some of what you're looking for (e.g. giant spaceplane parts, Mk3 loading ramps), but unfortunately it doesn't work so well in 1.0.x because of the changes made in Squad's part organization. Some people are working on compatibility patches, though, so keep an eye on that thread!
